title: Housing, Return-To-Work, And Travel (Podcast)
itunes:title: Housing, Return-To-Work, And Travel (Podcast)
description:
Erica Adelberg, MBS Strategist for Bloomberg Intelligence, discusses Fed minutes, US mortgage rates, and the outlook for home buying in 2022. Mark Smith, Senior Vice President-Investments at Wells Fargo Advisors, talks about markets, inflation, and investing strategies in 2022. Mark Dixon, CEO of IWG, plc, talks about hybrid work, real estate, renting offices, and returning to work in 2022 and beyond. Alisha Kapur, Senior Industry Manager at Similarweb, talks about travel in 2022. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
